channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump goes all-in on deportation fight, claims national security powers

item.title: Trump Is Right to Target the Houthis
item.description: Restraint has resulted in a disruption to international shipping and an unmolested campaign of hijacking, marauding, and terrorism.

item.title: MAGA’s Crisis of Confidence in America
item.description: In a case of unilateral disarmament in the propaganda war, the Trump administration functionally mothballed the U.S. Agency for Global Media.

item.title: AmeriCorps Is Being Used to Indoctrinate Participants With DEI In Violation Of Trump’s Executive Order
item.description: Training programs to enter AmeriCorps have been indoctrinating participants into having an anti-American worldview.

item.title: Liberal Judge Susan Crawford’s Husband Promotes Lawfare Against Homeschool Families
item.description: Progressive Judge Susan Crawford is running for a seat on the Wisconsin Supreme Court. Her husband wrote a book against homeschooling.

item.title: Pentagon deploys Navy warship that fought Houthis to new US southern border mission in line with Trump order
item.description: USS Gravely, a guided-missile destroyer, was deployed to the U.S.-Mexico border to help curb illegal seaborne immigration, Navy officials said.

item.title: California’s War on Farmers Made Eggs Even Scarcer
item.description: Proposition 12 certainly didn’t help alleviate the cost crisis.

item.title: Exclusive: At Least 32 Rhode Island School Districts Lie To Parents About Children’s Gender Dysphoria
item.description: Allowing children to 'socially transition' at school pushes many of them toward seeking medical interventions like genital mutilation.

item.title: If AOC Is the Democratic Future, the Party Is Even Worse Off Than We Think
item.description: There is no woke policy she doesn’t support.

item.title: Trump hangs a copy of Declaration of Independence in Oval Office
item.description: President Donald Trump has hung a copy of the Declaration of Independence in the Oval Office, according to images he shared on social media.

item.title: After Media’s Covid ‘Oopsie,’ I Don’t Want To Hear The Word ‘Misinformation’ Ever Again
item.description: Media gave air cover to censors by constructing artificial boundaries around acceptable thought and calling everything else 'misinformation.'
